column2:
{{c1::today}}

noun

this present day.
e.g. {{c1::today}} is a day of rest.
e.g. {{c1::today}}'s game against the Blue Jays.

adverb

on or in the course of this present day.
e.g. she's thirty {{c1::today}}.
e.g. he will appear in court {{c1::today}}.
